title: CAMILLE SKIN SERIES
body:
Hello Riot ! Please release some skins for Camille similar to "DarkStar", "WorldBreaker" and/or "CosmicBlade" Series !

Many Players have asked for it and it would be unfair to let them wait  xD  Me is very interested in new Camille Skin !

replies.body: Es ist immer noch ein Deutscher Forum! ^^

> ein Deutscher Forum

Wieso wage ich es, diese Aussage anzuweifeln...
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

_
(Kann Spuren von Ironie enthalten!)_

"Many players asked for it and it would be unfair to let them wait"
_insert one billion links of players asking for skin xy_
